emotion_to_convey.title: You want the receiver to feel you are

user_relationship_duration.title: Duration of relationship with the receiver

options.value: Your professor, for an official school activity.

email_purpose.title: What is the primary purpose of this email?

options.value: To inform your professor about your involvement in a school activity and its potential impact on your coursework.

context_background.title: What context or background information is important for the recipient to know?

options.value: Details about the school activity (name, dates, nature), and how it might affect your attendance or ability to complete assignments/exams.

tone_style.title: What tone and style should your email convey?

options.value: Formal and respectful, demonstrating responsibility for your academic commitments while participating in school activities.

key_information.title: What key information must be included in the email?

options.value: Your name and student ID, the specific school activity you are participating in, the dates and duration of the activity, the course name and number, and any specific requests or proposed solutions regarding missed work or classes.
